root

Class Monster

  • java.lang.Object
    • root.Monster

  • public class Monster
extends java.lang.Object
    A monster in the server, it has an owner, stats and multiple cash values for battling, breeding and selling.
    Author:
    Csoma Silhab

        public void ageHealth()
        Modifies the monster's health and strength based on its age. It reaches a high point before steadily decreasing over time.

        public long calculateAge(java.util.Calendar current,

        Calculates the number of days between the current time and the monster's birth date.
        Parameters:
        current - the current date of the system
        birth - The birth date of the monster
        Returns:
        the age of the monster
